documents.document: IT'S MY 30th BIRTHDAY!!! Why not show your love for me by getting YOURSELF a present?! I have 2 wonderful shows on in the new year and tickets are on sale for both now. Re-gift them and your Christmas shopping's done too! https://t.co/0jf4useRwt https://t.co/FUQAmEGrwB

A Hundred Words For Snow has been listed by the wonderful women at @BechdelTheatre as one of their "Bechdel Friendly Shows for 2019" https://t.co/gUkMFAMTIU What amazing company to be in. #HundredWords❄️
@MadelineRGould wanna share how to get shout-outs? I know many other alums (myself included) who have felt how you did this morning and would love to know.

Also, if you want to catch her work before you have to enter some sort of lottery to get a ticket, why not come see #HundredWords @TrafStudios this march? Tickets are on sale now https://t.co/FUQAmEGrwB

My queen, my muse, my tiny wife, @TattyHennessy is in today's @ESGoLondon as one of the 7 best new playwrights to look out for this year! I am thrilled and not at all surprised, because she fucking ROCKS.

It's the second full week of the year, i've already had 3 rejections from jobs i've applied for. Trying very hard to remember that i have 2 shows coming up that I love in the next 2 months, while also panicking that i have no work at all after March 30th.
